tool_description: This API keeps College Football (CFB) fans informed with the latest data on scores, stats, standings, player info, summaries, stats, and more, offering a streamlined solution for staying updated.
name: College Football (CFF)
title: College Football (CFF)

api_list.name: CFB Player Rankings
CFB School Rankings
CFB Team Schedule
CFB Team Roster
CFB Injuries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://college-football-cff.p.rapidapi.com/injuries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "college-football-cff.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CFB Team List
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves CFB Team List

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III

api_list.name: CFB Standings
CFB Conferences
CFB Scoreboard
CFB Schedule
CFB School Commits
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves CFB School Commits

optional_parameters.name: school
optional_parameters.description:
default: 'Florida State'.
       ** Available Schools**
          Boston college || clemson || Duke || Florida State || Georgia Tech 
          || Louisville || miami || nc state || north carolina || pittsburgh || 
          syracuse || virginia || virginia tech || wake forest

api_list.name: CFB Rankings
CFB Picks
api_list.description:
Get CFB Game Picks

Path Parameters:
**gameId**. example: 401256194
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://college-football-cff.p.rapidapi.com/picks/401256194"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "college-football-cff.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://college-football-cff.p.rapidapi.com/picks/{gameid}"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
